title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.188 - Multi-facility provider
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.188 - Multi-facility provider

State Regulations
A provider delivering two or more types of health care; e.g.,a hospital and residential health care facility, or a retirement home and
residential health care facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.188

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
